verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish Every man עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- his own דִּגְל֤וֹ <WH1714> dig-Lo by his own standard בְאֹתֹת֙ <WH226> ve-'o-Tot with the ensign לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit house אֲבֹתָ֔ם <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam, of their father's יַחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> ya-cha-Nu shall pitch בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel מִנֶּ֕גֶד <WH5048> min-Ne-ged far off סָבִ֥יב <WH5439> sa-Viv about לְאֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> le-'o-hel- the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed of the congregation יַחֲנֽוּ׃ <WH2583> ya-cha-Nu. shall they pitch

וְהַחֹנִים֙ <WH2583> ve-ha-cho-Nim pitch קֵ֣דְמָה <WH6924> Ke-de-mah And on the east side מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah, toward the rising דֶּ֛גֶל <WH1714> De-gel of the sun shall they of the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh of the camp יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam; throughout their armies וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> ve-na-Si [shall be] captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei the son יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <WH5177> nach-Shon and Nahshon בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- of the children עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <WH5992> 'am-mi-na-Dav. of Amminadab

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah four וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים <WH7657> ve-shiv-'Im seventy אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> ve-Shesh and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred

וְהַחֹנִ֥ים <WH2583> ve-ha-cho-Nim And those that do pitch עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav next מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> mat-Teh next unto him [shall be] the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֑ר <WH3485> yis-so-sh-Char; of Issachar וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> ve-na-Si [shall be] captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei the son יִשָּׂשכָ֔ר <WH3485> yis-so-sh-Char, of Issachar נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <WH5417> ne-tan-'El and Nethaneel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- of the children צוּעָֽר׃ <WH6686> tzu-'Ar. of Zuar

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <WH6485> u-fe-ku-Dav; and those that were numbered אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah and four וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim thereof [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> ve-'ar-Ba' and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred ס sa-Mek

מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> mat-Teh [Then] the tribe זְבוּלֻ֑ן <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun; of Zebulun וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> ve-na-Si [shall be] captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei the son זְבוּלֻ֔ן <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun, of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <WH446> 'e-li-'Av and Eliab בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- of the children חֵלֹֽן׃ <WH2497> che-Lon. of Helon

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <WH6485> u-fe-ku-Dav; and those that were numbered שִׁבְעָ֧ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah and seven וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim thereof [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> ve-'ar-Ba' and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred

כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- that הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <WH6485> hap-pe-ku-Dim All that were numbered לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> le-ma-cha-Neh in the camp יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah מְאַ֨ת <WH3967> me-'At [were] an hundred אֶ֜לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וּשְׁמֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> u-she-mo-Nim and fourscore אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וְשֵֽׁשֶׁת־ <WH8337> ve-she-shet- and six אֲלָפִ֥ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand וְאַרְבַּע־ <WH702> ve-'ar-ba'- and four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam; throughout their armies רִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <WH7223> ri-sho-Nah These shall first יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5265> yis-Sa-'u. set forth ס sa-Mek

דֶּ֣גֶל <WH1714> De-gel [shall be] the standard מַחֲנֵ֧ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh of the camp רְאוּבֵ֛ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven of Reuben תֵּימָ֖נָה <WH8486> tei-Ma-nah On the south side לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam; according to their armies וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children רְאוּבֵ֔ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven, of Reuben אֱלִיצ֖וּר <WH468> 'e-li-Tzur [shall be] Elizur בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <WH7707> she-dei-'Ur. of Shedeur

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <WH6485> u-fe-ku-Dav; and those that were numbered שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <WH8337> shish-Shah and six וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im thereof [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> va-cha-Mesh and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred

וְהַחוֹנִ֥ם <WH2583> ve-ha-cho-Nim And those which pitch עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav next מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> mat-Teh by him [shall be] the tribe שִׁמְע֑וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on; of Simeon וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children שִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on, of Simeon שְׁלֻמִיאֵ֖ל <WH8017> she-lu-mi-'El [shall be] Shelumiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son צוּרִֽי־ tzu-ri- שַׁדָּֽי׃ <WH6701> shad-Dai of Zurishaddai

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered תִּשְׁעָ֧ה <WH8672> tish-'Ah and nine וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim of them [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> u-she-Losh and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred

וְמַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> ve-mat-Teh Then the tribe גָּ֑ד <WH1410> Gad; of Gad וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the sons גָ֔ד <WH1410> Gad, of Gad אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <WH460> 'el-ya-Saf [shall be] Eliasaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son רְעוּאֵֽל׃ <WH7467> re-'u-'El. of Reuel

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah and five וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im of them [were] forty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef, thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> ve-Shesh and six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim. and fifty

כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- that הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <WH6485> hap-pe-ku-Dim All that were numbered לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> le-ma-cha-Neh in the camp רְאוּבֵ֗ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven, of Reuben מְאַ֨ת <WH3967> me-'At [were] an hundred אֶ֜לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וְאֶחָ֨ד <WH259> ve-'e-Chad and one וַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וְאַרְבַּע־ <WH702> ve-'ar-ba'- and four מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam; throughout their armies וּשְׁנִיִּ֖ם <WH8145> u-she-ni-Yim in the second rank יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5265> yis-Sa-'u. And they shall set forth ס sa-Mek

וְנָסַ֧ע <WH5265> ve-na-Sa' shall set forward אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> 'o-hel- Then the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֛ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed of the congregation מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh with the camp הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim of the Levites בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch in the midst הַֽמַּחֲנֹ֑ת <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Not; of the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher as they יַחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> ya-cha-Nu as they encamp כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> ken so יִסָּ֔עוּ <WH5265> yis-Sa-'u, so shall they set forward אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do in his place לְדִגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1714> le-dig-lei-Hem. by their standards ס sa-Mek

דֶּ֣גֶל <WH1714> De-gel [shall be] the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh of the camp אֶפְרַ֛יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim לְצִבְאֹתָ֖ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam according to their armies יָ֑מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah; On the west side וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the sons אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <WH476> 'e-li-sha-Ma' [shall be] Elishama בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <WH5989> 'am-mi-Hud. of Ammihud

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im of them [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> va-cha-Mesh and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred

וְעָלָ֖יו <WH5921> ve-'a-Lav Next מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> mat-Teh And by him [shall be] the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh; of Manasseh וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh גַּמְלִיאֵ֖ל <WH1583> gam-li-'El [shall be] Gamaliel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son פְּדָהצֽוּר׃ <WH6301> pe-da-h-Tzur. of Pedahzur

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered שְׁנַ֧יִם <WH8147> she-Na-yim and two וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <WH7970> u-she-lo-Shim of them [were] thirty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <WH3967> u-ma-Ta-yim. and two hundred

וּמַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> u-mat-Teh Then the tribe בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> bin-ya-Min; of Benjamin וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the sons בִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> vin-ya-Min, of Benjamin אֲבִידָ֖ן <WH27> 'a-vi-Dan [shall be] Abidan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son גִּדְעֹנִֽי׃ <WH1441> gid-'o-Ni. of Gideoni

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered חֲמִשָּׁ֧ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah and five וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <WH7970> u-she-lo-Shim of them [were] thirty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> ve-'ar-Ba' and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred

כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- that הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <WH6485> hap-pe-ku-Dim All that were numbered לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> le-ma-cha-Neh of the camp אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim מְאַ֥ת <WH3967> me-'At [were] an hundred אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וּשְׁמֹֽנַת־ <WH8083> u-she-mo-nat- and eight אֲלָפִ֥ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand וּמֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> u-me-'Ah and an hundred לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam; throughout their armies וּשְׁלִשִׁ֖ים <WH7992> u-she-li-Shim in the third rank יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5265> yis-Sa-'u. And they shall go forward ס sa-Mek

דֶּ֣גֶל <WH1714> De-gel The standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh of the camp דָ֛ן <WH1835> dan of Dan צָפֹ֖נָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah [shall be] on the north side לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam; by their armies וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children דָ֔ן <WH1835> Dan, of Dan אֲחִיעֶ֖זֶר <WH295> 'a-chi-'E-zer [shall be] Ahiezer בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַמִּֽישַׁדָּֽי׃ <WH5996> 'am-Mi-shad-Dai. of Ammishaddai

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered שְׁנַ֧יִם <WH8147> she-Na-yim and two וְשִׁשִּׁ֛ים <WH8346> ve-shish-Shim of them [were] threescore אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> u-she-Va' and seven מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred

וְהַחֹנִ֥ים <WH2583> ve-ha-cho-Nim And those that encamp עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav next מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> mat-Teh by him [shall be] the tribe אָשֵׁ֑ר <WH836> 'a-Sher; of Asher וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children אָשֵׁ֔ר <WH836> 'a-Sher, of Asher פַּגְעִיאֵ֖ל <WH6295> pag-'i-'El [shall be] Pagiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עָכְרָֽן׃ <WH5918> 'a-che-Ran. of Ocran

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered אֶחָ֧ד <WH259> 'e-Chad and one וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im of them [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> va-cha-Mesh and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred

וּמַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> u-mat-Teh Then the tribe נַפְתָּלִ֑י <WH5321> naf-ta-Li; of Naphtali וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children נַפְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> naf-ta-Li, of Naphtali אֲחִירַ֖ע <WH299> 'a-chi-Ra' [shall be] Ahira בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עֵינָֽן׃ <WH5881> 'ei-Nan. of Enan

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered שְׁלֹשָׁ֧ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah and three וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim of them [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> ve-'ar-Ba' and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred
